Class Client

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Client
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

This is the main Client class, the interface between the player and the game. When you start the client you'll be prompted to enter an IP address. If you press Cancel you will connect to localhost, else you will connect to what you have entered.

Version:
2018-03-xx
Author:
Hasse Aro
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Client

public Client(java.lang.String serverIP)
Creates the Client object and tries to connect to the IP it's given. This is where all the initialization gets done for the player before we enter the server.

Parameters:
serverIP - The IP the Client will try to connect to.
Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
First creates the connection IP prompt, then creates the Client and give it the IP we've entered.

Parameters:
args - Not used.

Getter for the roomSize variable.

Returns:
Returns an int representing the current room size of the map.

public int getMaxFoods()
Getter for the maxFoods variable.

Returns:
Returns an int representing how many Food objects the server should have.

Updates the HashMap playerList with a player.

inPlayerId - The unique ID of the player.
inX - The X coordinate of the player.

updateCanvasFood

public void updateCanvasFood()
Updates the canvas foodList with the clients foodList.

sendPlayerPackage

public void sendPlayerPackage()
Sends out a PlayerPacket on the output stream containing information about our player, such as playerID, X coordinate, Y coordinate and Score. If we're disconnecting, send out a packet with 0 score.

sleep

public void sleep(int time)
Puts the thread in sleep for a given time.

Parameters:
time - How long the thread should sleep.

move

public void move()
The movement of the player. First it checks what direction we should be moving and accelerates or deaccelerates in that direction. Finally it moves the player.

shrink

public void shrink()
Keeps the player shrinking if the player have a score larger than 25. Corrects the players position when it shrinks and also changes the max speed, acceleration and friction of the player depending on score.

grow

public void grow()
Grows smooth if the player is supposed to grow more than one point of score. Also corrects the position.

checkFoodCollision

public void checkFoodCollision(java.lang.Boolean showDebug)
Checks for player collision with Food objects from the foodList. If the player eats a Food object, create a new Food with the same index as the old and add it to the foodList. Then send out the new Food object on the output stream.

Parameters:
showDebug - Shows debug messages if this boolean is true.

checkPlayerCollision

public void checkPlayerCollision()
Checks for player collision with an other player. All collision in Shape Arena is handled client side. If the player collides with an other player the method checks which player has the highest score. If you have the higher score you gain 30% of the other players score. If you have the lower score you reset your own score to 25, and also teleports to a random location on the map. When the player have collided we gain invincibility for a while, to prevent the player from eating the other player more than once.

handleCollision

public void handleCollision()
Handles the invincibility timer. If it is not 0, don't check for player collision.

invincible

public void invincible()
Turns the player invincible.
